text: Sabarimalayil Thanka Sooryodayam is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. Shankar, starring Madhu and Ambika in the lead roles.http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Poochakkaru-Mani-Kettum-1992/9465401228 ==Cast== * Madhu * Santhi Krishna * Sreenath * Sukumari * Jagathy Sreekumar * Kaviyoor Ponnamma * Nedumudi Venu * Premkumar * Jagannadha Varma * Jagannadhan * Kamalroy * Kunchan * Mamukkoya * Ranjini * Poojappura Ravi * Kollam Thulasi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Malayalam films scored by M. S. Viswanathan Category:Films directed by K. Shankar
title: Sabarimalayil Thanka Sooryodayam
